title: 21 Useful Items You'll Regret Not Buying From Nordstrom's Latest Major Sale
text:
Just when you finally recovered from the excitement (and possibly bank account damage) that Nordstrom's epic Anniversary Sale brought on back in July, the retailer is back with yet another sale. From now through Sunday, September 8, prices for tons of items across all categories are slashed by up to 40%.

Now, we don't know about you, but whenever we're transitioning from summer to fall, we feel the need to stock up on useful items (which should also be stylish, naturally) to wear over and over again. We're talking new fall jeans, the world's best affordable slouchy boots, slip skirts, basic tees, tanks, sweaters, and activewear, all from brands you already know and love.

Keep scrolling for 21 highly useful Nordstrom sale finds you'll regret not adding to your wardrobe.
